document.title: PSN : Mise a jour du 26/05/2010
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (26/05/2010) sur le PlayStation Network :
Offres spéciales (Disponible jusqu’au 9 juin) * Wakeboarding HD (prix initial – 14.99 € maintenant – 7.99 €) * Numblast (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) * Magic Orbz – Bundle Pack (prix initial – 12.99 € maintenant – 6.49 €) * Magic Orbz – Booster Pack (prix initial – 2.99 € maintenant – 1.49 €) * Magic Orbz – Winter Pack (prix initial – 2.99 € maintenant – 1.49 €) * Savage Moon: The Hera Campaign (PSP) (prix initial – 7.99 € maintenant – 3.99 €) * Echochrome Micro (PSP) (prix initial – 7.99 € maintenant – 4.99 €) * Numblast (PSP) (prix initial – 4.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) * LittleBigPlanet – The Gardens Level Kit (PSP) (prix initial – 2.99 € maintenant – 1.49 €) * LittleBigPlanet – The Sack That Time Forgot (PSP) (prix initial – 2.99 € maintenant – 1.49 €) * Fortix (mini) (prix initial – 3.99 € maintenant – 2.99 €) Jeux téléchargeables (PS3) * Sam and Max: The Devil’s Playhouse Episode 2 (Gratuit avec les droits de la saison, non disponibles à la vente individuelle) – Rating: PEGI 12 * Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype (12.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 7 Jeux téléchargeables (PSP) * DJ Max Fever (19.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 * Iron Man 2 (34.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 * Rugby League Challenge (19.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 (Non disponible en Belgique, Luxembourg et Suisse) * Voodoo Dice (9.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 – Essai et activation ( PS3 ) * Fret Nice (Essai: gratuit – Activation: 12.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 7 (Non disponible en Belgique) * Voodoo Dice (Essai: gratuit – Activation: 9.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 Minis (PS3/PSP) * Feel For Two (3.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 * VT Tennis (4.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 * Supermarket Mania (4.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 * Robin Hood: The Return of Richard (4.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 PSOne (PS3/PSP) * Final Fantasy IX (9.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 Démo (PS3) * Pixeljunk Shooter – Rating: PEGI 7 Démos (PSP) * Voodoo Dice – Rating: PEGI 3 * SBK®X – Rating: PEGI 3 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) * Just Cause 2 – Black Market “Boom!” Pack (1.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 18 * UFC Undisputed 2010 – Online Entitlement (à télécharger seulement si le code Voucher n’est plus valable à partir de votre jeu acheté en magasin) (3.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 16 * Lost Planet 2 – Monster Hunter Armour (gratuit) – Rating: PEGI 16 * SBK®X – Legends Pack (9.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 * Super Street Fighter IV – Super Femme Fatale Pack (3.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 * Buzz! – World Football Quiz (3.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 3 * Rock Band – Rating: PEGI 12 (Non disponible au Luxembourg) o Green Day Rock Band Song Export Pack (7.99 €) o The Great Southern Trendkill (Album) by Pantera (12.99 €) (Contient les chansons suivantes qui sont également vendus séparément) o (Reprise) Sand Blasted Skin (1.49 €) o 10’s (1.49 €) o 13 Steps To Nowhere (1.49 €) o Drag The Waters (1.49 €) o Floods (1.49 €) o Living Through Me (Hell’s Wrath) (1.49 €) o Suicide Note Pt. II (1.49 €) o The Great Southern Trendkill (1.49 €) o The Underground In America (1.49 €) o War Nerve (1.49 €) * Rock Band Network – Rating: PEGI 12 (Non disponible au Luxembourg) o A Little Faster by There For Tomorrow (1.49 €) o Being Here by The Stills (0.79 €) o Juke Joint Jezebel by KMFDM (1.49 €) o The Complexity of Light by Children of Nova (1.49 €) o We Are Not Anonymous by Unearth (1.49 €) * Guitar Hero 5 – Rating: PEGI 12 o Band Hero Track Pack 1 (Contient les chansons suivantes qui sont également vendus séparément) (5.49 €) o 7 Things by Miley Cyrus (1.99 €) o Falling Down by Selena Gomez (1.99 €) o Here We Go by Demi Lovato (1.99 €) * Karaoke Revolution – Rating: PEGI 12 o I Can’t Help Myself (Sugar Pie, Honey Bunch) (0.99 €) o I Heard It Through The Grapevine (0.99 €) o Just My Imagination (0.99 €) o Please Mr. Postman (0.99 €) o Spoonman (0.99 €) o Stop! In The Name Of Love (0.99 €) o The Reason (0.99 €) o The Tracks Of My Tears (0.99 €) o This Old Heart Of Mine (Is Weak For You) (0.99 €) o What Becomes Of The Broken Hearted? (0.99 €) o Youth Gone Wild (0.99 €) Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PSP) * LittleBigPlanet o Sack Circus Costume (gratuit) o Sack Circus Level Kit (2.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 7 * Buzz! Quiz World – World Football Quiz (3.99 €) – Rating: PEGI 12 Trailers (PS3) * DC Universe Online Inside the Studio Vlog * Aliens Vs Predator Multiplayer Tactics Trailer * Aliens Vs Predator Swarm Map Pack Trailer * Anarchy: Rush Hour Trailer * Army of Two: The 40th Day Chapters of Deceit Trailer * Dragon Age: Origins Dark Spawn Chronicles Trailer * Iron Man 2 Launch Trailer * Iron Man 2 Prologue Trailer Trailer (PSP) * Kingdom Hearts: Birth by Sleep Trailer Thème (PS3) * Mafia II Theme (gratuit) Thèmes premium (PS3) * Harry Potter Theme (1.99 €) (Seulement disponible en France) * After Burner Climax Theme (2.99 €) Thèmes dynamique (PS3) * MAG Raven Theme (1.99 €) * MAG SVER Theme (1.99 €) * MAG Valor Theme (1.99 €) Wallpapers (PS3) * Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype Wallpapers 3 and 4 Avatars premium (PS3) * Uncharted 2: Among Thieves – (0.25 €) chacun o Nathan Drake o Elena Fisher o Victor Sullivan o Chloe Frazier o Jeff o Tenzin o Karl Schafer o Zoran Lazarevic o Harry Flynn o Phurba Dagger * Söldner-X 2: Final Prototype – (0.25 €) chacun o Grollstein o Grubenriese o Mezzus II o Thor Source : http://fr.playstation.com/ Je pense que je vais profiter des offres spéciales sur Magic Orbz pour utiliser mon crédit PSN, et je vois aussi l’excellent FFIX … mais que faire ? Bon jeu à vous !
